channel.title: Hacked
channel.description: how can i get my account back in runescape if i was hacked :confused: ;D

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

this reminds me of when i my friend took my account after i quit and i forgot to tell him the bank pin but i told him not to change the pass… so he changed the pass called my cellphone and laughed at me so i simply did a password recovery and had it back in a sec although i waited until my bankpin was about to delete… lol if i waited about 2 more hours he would have had my bankpin
